Name: Field Hospital: Dr. Taylor's Story
About the game: Field Hospital is a short text-based bureaucratic detective game about hard decisions. As a detective investigate the tangled case of Dr. Taylor. Dive into past to recreate events of the War and discover interconnected fates of field hospital patients. Study patients’ info and decide who to treat and whom to refuse. Face consequences and read hand-crafted stories. Make different choices and see how it changes patients’ future. Features Meditative bureaucratic detective gameplay . For those who love reading and finding clues. Connect small pieces of information into solid stories. Hand-crafted characters with tangled fates . Pay attention and find connections. Your choices matter . See how stories unfold based on your decisions. Unlock different endings some of which are hidden. Alternative world of Great Wars Era . Take a glimpse at never-existed history inspired by real events. Short but dense experience . There are no filler characters. All of them are part of bigger plot or have personal stories by themselves.
